content: You can open this file from the desktop app's interface once your cloud is connected

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message explaining that users can access files from the desktop app's interface once their cloud connection is established. The text appears in a UI element related to private rooms or file sharing, providing context for users.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Desktop' should be consistently formatted (e.g., 'Desktop' or 'desktop'). Currently, it's capitalized.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Μπορείτε να ανοίξετε αυτό το αρχείο από τη διεπαφή της εφαρμογής desktop μόλις συνδεθεί το νέφος σας

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'το νέφος σας' (your cloud) is slightly awkward. It implies a personal cloud.  A more natural phrasing might be used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Μπορείτε να ανοίξετε αυτό το αρχείο από τη διεπαφή της εφαρμογής desktop μόλις συνδεθεί το νέφος.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "You can open this file" is overly formal in Spanish. "Usted" should be replaced with "Puedes" to match the tone of the original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Puedes abrir este archivo desde la interfaz de la aplicación de escritorio cuando su nube está conectada

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The French translation lacks a comma after 'interface'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vous pouvez ouvrir ce fichier à partir de l'interface, de l'application de bureau une fois que votre cloud est connecté

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Ձեր ամպը միանա" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "your cloud is connected." A more accurate translation would convey the state of being connected.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using something like "երբ Ձեր ամպը միացված է" (when your cloud is connected) or "երբ Ձեր ամպը կապված է" (when your cloud is linked).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "You can open this file from the desktop app's interface" is not entirely accurate. 'ໂປຣແກຣມ desktop' is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Lao. The phrase 'desktop app' refers to the application on your computer.  It's missing the element of the *interface*.  The sentence implies accessing it *through* the app's interface.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ທ່ານສາມາດເປີດໄຟລ໌ນີ້ໄດ້ຈາກໜ້າຈໍໂປຣແກຣມ desktop ຂອງທ່ານເມື່ອເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ກັບ cloud ຂອງທ່ານ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is somewhat awkward. While understandable, it could be improved for better flow in Lao.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເມື່ອເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ກັບ cloud ຂອງທ່ານແລ້ວ, ທ່ານສາມາດເປີດໄຟລ໌ນີ້ໄດ້ຈາກໂປຣແກຣມ desktop ຂອງເຈົ້າ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'your cloud' is translated as 'swojej chmury'. While technically correct, a more natural and user-friendly translation would be 'chmury' (cloud) or 'Twojej chmury' (your cloud) depending on the desired level of formality.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dany plik będzie można otworzyć z poziomu interfejsu aplikacji komputerowej po podłączeniu chmury / po podłączeniu Twojej chmury

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, 'z poziomu interfejsu' is a bit verbose. A more concise phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: z interfejsu aplikacji komputerowej

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Pode abrir este ficheiro a partir da interface de aplicações de desktop, uma vez que a sua nuvem está ligada" is a bit literal and could be more natural. 'Desktop app' is better translated as 'aplicativo desktop' or 'programa desktop'. 'A partir de' can be simplified to 'de'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pode abrir este ficheiro de aplicativo desktop, uma vez que a sua nuvem esteja conectada.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'uma vez que a sua nuvem está ligada' is grammatically correct, but 'esteja conectada' would be slightly more fluent and common usage.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: uma vez que a sua nuvem esteja conectada

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'aplicativos de desktop' is a bit awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'aplicativo desktop' or 'desktop'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Você pode abrir este arquivo a partir da interface do aplicativo desktop, uma vez que sua nuvem está conectada

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'uma vez que' can be replaced with 'assim que' for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Você pode abrir este arquivo a partir da interface do aplicativo desktop, assim que sua nuvem está conectada

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "v-ați conectat la contul dvs cloud" is overly literal and sounds unnatural in Romanian. It translates to "you have connected to your cloud account". A more natural phrasing would be 'odată ce vă conectați la cloud' or 'odată ce cloud-ul este conectat'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Puteți deschide acest fișier din aplicația pentru desktop odată ce vă conectați la cloud.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "cloud is connected" is translated as "මේඝය සම්බන්ධිත විට" (meghaya sambhanditha vitha). While technically correct, it's not the most natural or clear way to express it in Sinhala. A more natural phrasing would be something like "ඔබගේ මේඝය සම්බන්ධ වන විට" (obage meghaya sambhandhi vana vitha).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබගේ මේඝය සම්බන්ධ වන විට (obage meghaya sambhandhi vana vitha)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is slightly awkward. While understandable, it could be improved for better flow. Specifically, the order of 'ඔබගේ' (obage - your) and 'මේඝය' (meghaya - cloud) can be shifted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මේඝය සම්බන්ධ වන විට ඔබට වැඩතල යෙදුමේ අතුරු මුහුණතෙන් මෙම ගොනුව ඇරීමට හැකිය (meghaya sambhandhi vana vitha obage arata muthuwa gehala gamata, denna goonuwa arimata hakiyata)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'desktop app' is not directly translated. While 'aplikácia pre počítače' conveys the general meaning, 'desktop app' often refers to a specific type of application. A more precise translation might be 'aplikácia pre plochu' or 'počítačová aplikácia' depending on the desired level of formality and context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'aplikácia pre plochu' or 'počítačová aplikácia' for a more precise translation of 'desktop app'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ko ste povezani v oblaku" is a literal translation of 'when you are connected to the cloud'. A more natural and accurate translation would be 'ko je vaš oblak povezan' or 'ko je cloud povezan'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ko je vaš oblak povezan

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'десктоп' is transliterated. It's common to use the English word directly in Serbian, or a localized equivalent, depending on the context.  'Рачунарска апликација' or simply 'апликација' might be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Можете отворити ову датотеку са интерфејса апликације или рачунарске апликације када се ваш облак повеже

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'када се ваш облак повеже' is somewhat awkward.  A more natural phrasing would imply 'when your cloud is connected' is linking the cloud to a specific account or service.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Можете отворити ову датотеку са интерфејса десктоп апликације када се повежете са облаком

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'oblak' (cloud) is generally understood, but 'vaš oblak' sounds slightly unnatural. A more natural phrasing would be 'vaš nalog u oblaku' or 'vaš cloud nalog'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Možete otvoriti ovu datoteku sa interfejsa desktop aplikacije kada se vaš nalog u oblaku poveže
